DOC.brief_summary: The study is being conducted to see whether CP-690,550 ointment has potential as a safe and effective treatment for adult patients with mild to moderate chronic plaque psoriasis.
DOC.brief_title: CP-690-550 Ointment For Chronic Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Mild to moderate chronic plaque psoriasis (psoriasis vulgaris), with the duration of at least 6 months; A target plaque of at least 9 sq. cm. Demonstrates "rebound" or "flare" of chronic plaque psoriasis; Non plaque form of psoriasis; Currently have or history of psoriatic arthritis; Current drug induced psoriasis; Currently on systemic therapy or was on systemic therapy for psoriasis within the previous 6 months; Currently on phototherapy for psoriasis or was on phototherapy within the previous 3 months
